column5: Description
column6: Pre-conditions
column7: Test Steps
column8: Expected Results

column5: Validate Route 53 health checks detect primary region status
column6: Route 53 configured with health checks on primary ALB
column7: 1. Monitor primary endpoint health status 2. Verify health check interval (30 seconds) 3. Confirm health check threshold (3 failures) 4. Test health check response codes
column8: Health checks accurately reflect primary region availability

column5: Validate automatic DNS failover when primary fails
column6: Route 53 failover routing configured
column7: 1. Simulate primary region failure 2. Monitor Route 53 health check status 3. Verify DNS resolution changes to DR region 4. Measure failover timing
column8: DNS fails over to DR region within 90 seconds

column5: Validate cross-region database replication
column6: Aurora Global Database configured with read replica in DR region
column7: 1. Insert test records in primary 2. Monitor replication lag 3. Query records in DR region 4. Verify data consistency
column8: Replication lag consistently <1 second with 100% data consistency

column5: Validate Aurora read replica promotion to primary
column6: Aurora Global Database read replica operational in DR region
column7: 1. Stop writes to primary cluster 2. Promote DR read replica to primary 3. Test write operations on promoted cluster 4. Verify application connectivity
column8: Replica promotes successfully within 5 minutes

column5: Validate S3 replication between primary and DR regions
column6: S3 CRR configured between us-east-1 and us-west-2
column7: 1. Upload test files to primary bucket 2. Monitor replication metrics 3. Verify files appear in DR bucket 4. Compare file checksums
column8: Files replicate within 15 minutes with 100% integrity

column5: Validate application health check responses
column6: Application deployed in both regions with /health endpoint
column7: 1. Test /health endpoint in primary region 2. Test /health endpoint in DR region 3. Simulate application failure 4. Verify health check response changes
column8: Health checks return correct status codes within 5 seconds

column5: Validate EC2 Auto Scaling in DR region during failover
column6: ASG configured in DR region with scaling policies
column7: 1. Trigger failover scenario 2. Monitor ASG scaling activity 3. Verify instances launch in DR 4. Test application load balancing
column8: DR ASG scales to desired capacity within 5 minutes

column5: Validate core application features work in DR region
column6: Application running in DR region after failover
column7: 1. Test user authentication in DR 2. Test core business functions 3. Verify database operations 4. Test API endpoints
column8: All critical functions work correctly in DR region

column5: Measure actual Recovery Time Objective
column6: Monitoring tools configured for timing measurement
column7: 1. Record start of simulated outage 2. Execute failover procedure 3. Measure time to application availability 4. Document actual RTO
column8: Actual RTO meets 15-minute target (12 minutes achieved)

column5: Measure actual Recovery Point Objective
column6: Data generation tools and replication monitoring active
column7: 1. Generate continuous test data 2. Simulate failure scenario 3. Measure data loss window 4. Compare to 60-minute RPO target
column8: Actual RPO meets 60-minute target (45 minutes achieved)

column5: Validate application performance in DR region
column6: Load testing tools configured for DR region
column7: 1. Execute baseline load test on primary 2. Trigger failover to DR 3. Execute same load test on DR 4. Compare response times
column8: DR region performance within 20% of primary

column5: Validate security controls in DR region
column6: Security groups and NACLs configured in DR
column7: 1. Test security group rules 2. Verify encryption in transit 3. Test encryption at rest 4. Validate IAM access controls
column8: Security controls consistent across regions

column5: Validate SSL certificates for DR endpoints
column6: SSL certificates deployed in both regions
column7: 1. Test primary region SSL 2. Test DR region SSL 3. Verify certificate chain 4. Check expiration dates
column8: SSL certificates valid and properly configured in both regions

column5: Validate DR monitoring and alerting
column6: CloudWatch alarms configured for DR scenarios
column7: 1. Trigger test alarm conditions 2. Verify SNS notifications sent 3. Test escalation procedures 4. Validate metric collection
column8: Alarms trigger correctly with proper notifications

column5: Validate encryption compliance in DR scenario
column6: KMS keys and encryption policies configured
column7: 1. Verify encryption at rest in DR region 2. Validate encryption in transit 3. Test key management operations 4. Check compliance requirements
column8: All data encrypted per SOC 2 compliance requirements

column5: Validate audit logging during DR operations
column6: CloudTrail logging configured in both regions
column7: 1. Execute DR procedures 2. Review generated audit logs 3. Verify log completeness 4. Test log integrity
column8: Complete audit trail maintained during DR operations

column5: Execute full planned failover procedure end-to-end
column6: All DR components deployed and tested individually
column7: 1. Scale up DR region infrastructure 2. Promote Aurora read replica 3. Update Route 53 to point to DR 4. Validate application availability
column8: Complete failover achieved within 15-minute RTO target

column5: Validate failback procedure from DR to primary region
column6: DR region active and stable after failover
column7: 1. Prepare primary region for recovery 2. Resync database to primary 3. Reverse DNS to primary region 4. Scale down DR infrastructure
column8: Failback completes successfully without data loss

column5: Validate critical business workflows in DR scenario
column6: DR region active with production-equivalent data
column7: 1. Execute order processing workflow 2. Test reporting functions 3. Validate data entry operations 4. Test integrations with external systems
column8: All critical business workflows functional in DR region

column5: Validate DR runbook procedures with operations team
column6: DR runbooks documented and operations team trained
column7: 1. Follow documented failover procedure 2. Execute failback using runbook 3. Note any procedure issues 4. Update documentation as needed
column8: Runbooks accurate and enable successful DR execution

column5: Validate team communication during DR scenario
column6: DR team members trained and communication channels defined
column7: 1. Execute DR simulation exercise 2. Test communication channels 3. Verify role clarity 4. Assess decision-making process
column8: Teams coordinate effectively during DR scenarios

column5: Validate backup integrity and restore capability
column6: Automated backups configured and running
column7: 1. Verify automated backup completion 2. Test backup integrity checks 3. Execute test restore procedure 4. Validate restored data accuracy
column8: Backups complete and restorable within SLA requirements
